title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
utme_requirements: Five (5) TC II merit, 'O' Level or NTC/NBC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting and Shorthand.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: EDUCATION AND ARABIC
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in relevant subjects including Arabic.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in relevant subjects including English Language and Arabic.
subjects: Arabic and any two (2) relevant Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: EDUCATION AND BIOLOGY
de_requirements: NCE/'A' Level passes in Biology and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Biology and two (2) other subjects from Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: EDUCATION AND CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit in Religious Studies and one (1) other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or TC II merit in five (5) subjects including English Language, Religious Studies and three (3) other Arts subjects.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subject including Religious studies and one (1) other subject.

title: EDUCATION AND ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION AND HAUSA
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects to include Hausa.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Hausa.
subjects: Hausa, one (1) Arts and one (1) subject from Economics, French, Geography/Physics, Government, History, Islamic Studies, Literature in English and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION AND HISTORY:
de_requirements: Two (2) NCE merit/'A' Level passes in History and one (1) other relevant Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, History and three (3) relevant Arts subjects.
subjects: History and any other two (2) subjects chosen from Christian Religious Studies / Islamic Studies, Literature in English, French, Yoruba, Geography/Physics, Economics, Government and Hausa.

title: EDUCATION AND ISLAMIC STUDIES:
de_requirements:
(i) NCE merit in Islamic Studies and Education.

 

(ii) 'A' Level passes in Arabic/ Islamic Studies and any other relevant subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Islamic Studies and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Islamic Studies/Arabic and two (2) other Social Science or Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION AND MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes/NCE in Mathematics and one (1) Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics plus one (1) other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of the following Science subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: EDUCATION AND SOCIAL STUDIES
de_requirements:
(i) NCE Social Studies from recognized Colleges.

(ii)           Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language plus two (2) Arts /Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) of Christian Religious Studies, Economics, Geography/Physics, Government, History and Islamic Studies.

title: GUIDANCE AND COUNSELLING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes or NCE in two (2) subjects plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level NTC/NBC credit passes or TC II merit including English Language with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.

title: HOME ECONOMICS AND EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    NCE merit in Home Economics

(ii) 'A' Level passes in two (2) of Chemistry or any Biology, Botany and Agricultural Science.

(iii) ND/HND credit in Home Economics or Food Science or Hotel and Catering Management or any other related programme
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level NTC/NBC credit passes or TC II merit including English Language, Mathematics, Home Economics, Biology and Chemistry.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology or Agricultural Science and one (1) other subject.

title: PHYSICAL AND HEALTH EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.
utme_requirements:
i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language.

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.
